books.title: The Stainless Steel Rat
books.author: Harry Harrison
books.summary: An intergalactic thief tries life on the side of the law.

books.title: The Last of the Mohicans
books.author: James Fenimore Cooper
books.summary: Frontiersmen and Native Americans help transport a colonel’s daughters through upper New York during the French and Indian War.

books.title: An Autobiography
books.author: Theodore Roosevelt
books.summary: The autobiography of American President Theodore Roosevelt.

books.title: The Lives and Opinions of Eminent Philosophers
books.author: Diogenes Laërtius
books.summary: Brief biographies of the prominent philosophers of ancient Greece.

books.title: Ragged Dick
books.author: Horatio Alger Jr.
books.summary: A young shoeshiner rises the social ladder thanks to his wits, his work ethic, his honesty, and a bit of luck.

books.title: Right Ho, Jeeves
books.author: P. G. Wodehouse
books.summary: Bertie Wooster and his valet Jeeves try their hand at matchmaking in upper-class England.

books.title: Misalliance
books.author: George Bernard Shaw
books.summary: On a pleasant summer afternoon, a sudden plane crash followed by a would-be assassin interrupt a family’s conversations about marriage.

books.title: The Sketchbook of Geoffrey Crayon, Gent.
books.author: Washington Irving
books.summary: A collection of 34 essays and short stories, including “The Legend of Sleepy Hollow” and “Rip Van Winkle.”

books.title: The Rasp
books.author: Philip MacDonald
books.summary: A retired colonel investigates the elaborate murder of a cabinet minister.

books.title: The Turn of the Screw
books.author: Henry James
books.summary: A governess moves in to a haunted manor.

books.title: Roughing It
books.author: Mark Twain
books.summary: Mark Twain’s semiautobiographical account of his travel across the United States.

books.title: The Secret of Chimneys
books.author: Agatha Christie
books.summary: A murder at a country house embroils its weekend guests in an international regicide, while a famous jewel thief may be lurking among them.

books.title: Democracy and Education
books.author: John Dewey
books.summary: A critical survey of the philosophy and aims of education in a democratic society.

books.title: The American Crisis
books.author: Thomas Paine
books.summary: A collection of articles written during the American Revolutionary War that outline Paine’s support for a self-governing America.

books.title: Poetry
books.author: Georgia Douglas Johnson
books.summary: A collection of poems by Georgia Douglas Johnson.

books.title: The Importance of Being Earnest
books.author: Oscar Wilde
books.summary: A comedy skewering Victorian high society.

books.title: Short Fiction
books.author: Poul Anderson
books.summary: A collection of science fiction short stories by Poul Anderson ordered by date of publication.

books.title: Household Tales
books.author: Jacob Grimm
books.summary: A collection of Germanic fairy tales containing the classic stories of Cinderella, Snow-White, Rapunzel, and other well known characters.

books.title: Religion and the Rise of Capitalism
books.author: R. H. Tawney
books.summary: A tracing of the development of religious thought from the Middle Ages to the dawn of the Industrial Revolution.

books.title: A Negro Explorer at the North Pole
books.author: Matthew Henson
books.summary: The self-told story of the black man who accompanied Robert Peary during the first trip to the North Pole.
